text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Triple Crown champion, victory at the Arima Kinen, five G1 wins…

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: This gnawing in my stomach won't stop though. I'm hungry for more…

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: When… When is the next race?!

Brian's whirlwind of a record, Triple Crown and beyond, continues 
into the next year.

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
They're past the final turn into the last stretch! Narita Brian has 
already taken the lead!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text: She's blasted ahead! Brian's lead is only growing now!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
She's unchallenged—no one can catch up to her six—no, seven-length 
lead! And that's the finish!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text: There's no doubt about it! Narita Brian's won the Hanshin Daishoten!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Well done, Brian.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
I can't believe you made a personal best time in a long-distance race. 
You truly have no bounds.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
You've been chosen as Racer of the Year, you're winning all these 
races…

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Narita Brian! You're not just making Team Sirius happy, you're making 
the whole Twinkle Series ecstatic! Keep it up!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: You're welcome.

Next is the Tenno Sho (Spring), the race your sister won. Let's make it 
a win for both sisters!

Next is the Tenno Sho (Spring), the race your sister won. Let's make it 
a win for both sisters!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Of course I'll win… But first I've got a winning concert to go to.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Everyone says she'll beat President Rudolph's seven-crown record. 
This looks to be quite a year for Brian.
Yes. Everyone, including me, has high hopes for Brian.

I'm like one of her fans, unable to hold in my excitement for what 
she'll accomplish next.

text_block_list.name: Fan A
text_block_list.text: Briaaan! Your race was the best today!

text_block_list.name: Fan B
text_block_list.text: We know you'll win the Tenno Sho (Spring) too!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Hwaaa… Brian… So that's how a Triple Crown winner races!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: I wanna soar high in a race like that too!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: I wouldn't expect to find you anywhere else.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Big Sis… How's your leg?

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
I'll need a little longer until I've recovered. I'm starting to get out of 
shape.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
You're doing as well as ever, Racer of the Year. After that landslide 
victory at the Hanshin Daishoten, I can't help but wonder how much 
higher you'll soar.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
I don't really have a goal in mind for that stuff. I'm just trying to get to 
the finish before anyone else. That's all.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
Of course. Your goalpost is ever-moving, always leaving you hungry 
for more.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
You do look like you're having fun though. You really love nothing 
more than to run.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
I look like I'm having fun? Even though I'm never satisfied by any 
race?

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Yes, I'm sure of it.

With the Hanshin Daishoten behind her, Narita Brian is back to 
training.

She needs to be in top shape for her next big race, the Tenno Sho 
(Spring).

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Exhale…
You look a little tired. Everything good?
You look a little tired. Everything good?

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: It's no problem. I'm not even running at full strength.
Glad to hear it. Let's play it safe and run the woodchip course next.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: All right, got it.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Brian has the drive to keep running forever.

That's what makes her so strong. We'd better raise our expectations 
to match her.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: I'm excited to see her next race too.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
I feel the same, but we can't simply expect her to do everything. We 
need to follow her example.
choice_data_list:
I'll do my best to make sure she's ready to 
perform at her peak.

text_block_list.text: I'll do my best to make sure she's ready to perform at her peak.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Oh!

text_block_list.name: Trainer
text_block_list.text: What's wrong?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: The race—isn't it almost the deadline for Brian to register?
I think you're right.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Oh my… It'd be bad to forget that.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
However high her performance, it's meaningless if she can't enter the 
race.

I'll go right now before I forget. Look after everyone's training, 
McQueen.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Brian?!
Wh-what happened?!
